Package core

Interface ConnectionListener

All Known Implementing Classes:
AdjacencyGraphvizReport, ConnectivityDtnsim2Report, ConnectivityONEReport, ConnectivityReportConnector, ContactsDuringAnICTReport, ContactsPerHourReport, ContactTimesReport, EncountersVSUniqueEncountersReport, EventLogPanel, EventLogReport, InterContactTimesReport, TotalContactTimeReport, TotalEncountersReport, UniqueEncountersReport
public interface ConnectionListener
Interface for classes that want to be informed about connections between hosts.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    hostsConnected(DTNHost host1, DTNHost host2)
    Method is called when two hosts are connected.
    void
    hostsDisconnected(DTNHost host1, DTNHost host2)
    Method is called when connection between hosts is disconnected.

  • Method Details

    • hostsConnected

      void hostsConnected(DTNHost host1, DTNHost host2)
      Method is called when two hosts are connected.
      Parameters:
      host1 - Host that initiated the connection
      host2 - Host that was connected to

    • hostsDisconnected

      void hostsDisconnected(DTNHost host1, DTNHost host2)
      Method is called when connection between hosts is disconnected.
      Parameters:
      host1 - Host that initiated the disconnection
      host2 - Host at the other end of the connection
